    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030104</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030104</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Los nucleótidos no nucleicos</string>
            <string language="en">Non-nucleic nucleotides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nichtnukleinnukleotide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nucléotides Non-nucléiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">nucleotides Non-non-nucleic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nucleotidi Non-nucleici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μη-νουκλεϊνικές νουκλεοτίδες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno tiene que descubrir moléculas formadas por nucleótidos que no forman ácidos nucleicos, pero que son muy importantes para el correcto funcionamiento del metabolismo.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student has to discover molecules formed by nucleotides which do not form nucleic acids, but which are very important for the metabolism to function correctly.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">nucleótidos</string>
            <string language="en">nucleotides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer entdecken 
muß, daß Moleküle durch Nukleotide sich bildeten, die nicht 
Nukleinsäuren bilden, aber die sehr wichtig sind, damit der 
Metabolismus richtig arbeitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Il est très importante pour que le métabolisme 
que fonctionne la recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit découvrir 
les molécules ont formé par les nucléotides qui ne forment pas les 
acides nucléiques, mais qui correctement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pesquisa em que o estudante tem que descobrir 
que as moléculas deram forma pelos nucleotides que não dão forma a 
ácidos nucleic, mas que é muito importante para que o metabolism 
funcione corretamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La ricerca in cui l'allievo deve scoprire che le 
molecole hanno formato dai nucleotidi che non formano gli acidi 
nucleici, ma che è molto importante affinchè il metabolismo funzioni
correttamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ανακαλύψει 
τα μόρια που διαμορφώνονται από τις νουκλεοτίδες που δεν 
διαμορφώνουν τα νουκλεϊνικά οξέα, αλλά που είναι πολύ 
σημαντικές για το μεταβολισμό να λειτουργήσει σωστά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nukleotide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nucléotides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">nucleotides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nucleotidi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νουκλεοτίδες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
